prompt: Create a vibrant forgot password screen with a gradient background transitioning from purple (Colors.purple[600]) at the top to blue (Colors.blue[600]) at the bottom. Use a Column layout with crossAxisAlignment.stretch for full-width elements, centered vertically. Display a 'Password Reset' title in white, font size 32, and bold. Add a subtitle in white with 70% opacity (Colors.white70) saying 'Enter your email for a reset link.' Include a TextField with a white background, rounded border (borderRadius: 10.0), and hint text 'Your Email' in gray. Use a prefix icon (Icons.email) in purple (Colors.purple[400]). Add a full-width ElevatedButton with a purple background (Colors.purple[500]), white text 'Send Reset Link', and rounded corners. Below, place a TextButton with 'Back to Login' in white. Use padding of 28.0 and space elements with SizedBox(height: 18.0).
